effect.sun-moon: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.

short_effect.sun-moon: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
